name: 胡憲倫
objective: To understand how Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management can solve environmental problems. Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), one of the most important tools for analyzing and assessing environmental problems will be taught during the course of the semester. Students will also be learning a popular LCA software, SimaPro. Various applications related to LCA, such as carbon footprinting and labeling, and eco-design will also be practiced in the class.
schedule:
1. Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment I: History, development, and Applications
2. Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment II: Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management
3. Methodology of LCA: I. Goal and Scope definition and inventory analysis)
4. Methodology of LCA- II. Inventory analysis
5. LCA Software SimaPro: Introduction and Practices (Make learning groups)
6. Methodology of LCA- III. Methodology of LCIA
7. Methodology of LCA- IV. Methodology of LCIA)
8. Methodology of LCA- V. Uncertainty, sensitivity analysis, and interpretation
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Group report- LCA for one product or service 
11. Other Types of LCA (Eco-efficiency, MFCA, Carbon Footprinting, Water Foorpeinting, Social LCA, and Organizational LCA, etc.)
12. LCA Applications: Environmental Declarations and Carbon Labeling
13. LCA Applications: Green Processes and Products, Eco-design
14. LCA Outlook and Latest Development: Net Zero and Biodiversity
15. Special Topic: Natural Capital Accounting and LCA
16. Team Project Presentation
17. Team Project Presentation
18. Final Exam
